public EntityActor actor(Recording recording,
                         java.lang.String actorName,
                         org.bukkit.entity.Player viewerPlayer,
                         org.bukkit.World world)
actor

Parameters:
recording - Recording to use for the new actor
actorName - name to give spawned actor
viewerPlayer - viewer who can see this actor (null for everyone in the same world)
world - viewer's world
Returns:
The EntityActor which was created.
